name: OTP_COND_QUESNS
description: This table contains the inpatient condition questions (if configured) for an order template

columns.name: OTP_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the order template record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: COND_QUESN_ID
columns.description: The unique question ID of the question record that identifies the condition question for an inpatient order.

columns.name: COND_QUESN_DAT
columns.description: The question date of the question record that identifies the condition question for an inpatient order.

columns.name: COND_QUESN_RESP
columns.description: The response to a condition question on an inpatient order.

columns.name: COND_QUESN_SEL_YN
columns.description: This item indicates whether the related condition question is selected ("checked") or unselected ("unchecked") for an inpatient conditional order.
